message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $110.
Hi Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the product and your willingness to sell it, but I can only pay up to $100 for it. Looking forward to your response.
Hi Bob, thank you for your offer. I understand that you're willing to pay $100, but I was thinking more along the lines of $105. Would you be willing to meet me halfway?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I am unable to meet at $105. I am still willing to pay up to $100 for the product. Thank you for considering my offer.
